document_data.name: Lantern-house
document_data.mainbody: The '''Lantern-house''' was a lighthouse found in the city of [[Almorel]] on the [[Lake of Mists]] in the [[Hordelands]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}
document_data.Location: The lighthouse was built upon a thin peninsula that jutted into the Lake of Mists just north of Almorel. The peninsula was actually part of a larger submerged reef that posed a threat to incoming vessels.
document_data.Inhabitants: The Lantern-house was run by [[Kiros Iskin]] who also lived within the structure.
